title: Developing Self-Regulated Learning Strategies in Online Language Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: A blended learning program for beginner-level adult learners, focusing on improving self-regulated learning skills in language acquisition through digital resources.

learning_goals: Learners can establish and execute weekly learning plans utilizing digital learning resources.
Learners can periodically assess their oral presentation skills using self-evaluation tools.
Learners can create and apply personalized strategy checklists for maintaining learning motivation.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
